name: Kathmandu
description: Kathmandu, the capital of Nepal, is a vibrant city known for its cultural heritage, ancient temples, and bustling streets. It's a gateway to the Himalayas and a treasure trove of history and culture.

name: Pokhara
description: Pokhara, often called the 'City of Lakes,' is a popular destination for its stunning views of the Annapurna range, serene lakes, and adventure activities like paragliding.

name: Lumbini
description: Lumbini is the birthplace of Lord Buddha and a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is a serene and spiritual destination with monasteries and sacred gardens.

name: Chitwan National Park
description: Chitwan National Park is a wildlife haven, home to Bengal tigers, one-horned rhinos, and exotic bird species. Jungle safaris and canoe rides are major attractions.

name: Bhaktapur
description: Bhaktapur, known as the 'City of Devotees,' boasts well-preserved medieval architecture, narrow streets, and beautiful squares like Durbar Square.

name: Patan Durbar Square
description: Patan Durbar Square is a UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring ancient palaces, intricate temples, and rich craftsmanship reflecting Nepal's rich history.

name: Nagarkot
description: Nagarkot is a hill station near Kathmandu offering panoramic views of the Himalayas, including Mount Everest, especially during sunrise and sunset.

name: Gosaikunda
description: Gosaikunda is a sacred alpine lake located in the Langtang National Park, attracting pilgrims and trekkers with its natural beauty and tranquility.

name: Annapurna Base Camp
description: Annapurna Base Camp is a breathtaking trekking destination, offering close-up views of Annapurna and Machhapuchhre peaks amidst lush landscapes.

name: Sagarmatha National Park
description: Sagarmatha National Park is home to Mount Everest, pristine glaciers, and Sherpa culture. It's a paradise for trekkers and mountaineers.

name: Janakpur
description: Janakpur is a historic city and the birthplace of Goddess Sita. It is known for the Janaki Mandir and its rich Maithili culture.

name: Ilam
description: Ilam is a picturesque hill station famous for its lush tea gardens, scenic landscapes, and tranquil environment.

name: Bandipur
description: Bandipur is a charming hilltop town known for its preserved Newari culture, traditional architecture, and panoramic mountain views.

name: Rara Lake
description: Rara Lake, the largest lake in Nepal, is a hidden gem surrounded by pristine wilderness, offering peace and stunning natural beauty.

name: Poon Hill
description: Poon Hill is a popular trekking destination providing spectacular sunrise views of the Annapurna and Dhaulagiri mountain ranges.

name: Dhulikhel
description: Dhulikhel is a peaceful town offering panoramic views of the Himalayas, historic temples, and opportunities for hiking.

name: Tansen
description: Tansen, a historic town in Palpa, is known for its traditional Newari culture, cobblestone streets, and panoramic mountain views.

name: Manang
description: Manang is a stunning mountain town on the Annapurna Circuit, offering breathtaking landscapes and unique Tibetan-influenced culture.

name: Dhorpatan Hunting Reserve
description: Dhorpatan Hunting Reserve is Nepal's only hunting reserve, known for its diverse wildlife and scenic alpine meadows.

name: Koshi Tappu Wildlife Reserve
description: Koshi Tappu Wildlife Reserve is a birdwatcher's paradise, home to rare bird species and vibrant wetlands.
